channel.title: Open Science on Aziz Khan
channel.description: Recent content in Open Science on Aziz Khan

item.title: Computational biology without borders
item.description: I wrote this blog post for Open Bioinformatics Foundation (OBF) and it was originally posted on October 26, 2019 on OBF website. OBF supported me with a travel grant of $1000 to attend the ISMB/ECCB and BOSC 2019 meeting in Basel, July 2019. Computational tools and software are now becoming the core of scientific discovery, and making it open source and sharing it freely with the community helps to take scientific discoveries to the next level.
